name: Lost and Found VR (Patrick)
description:
This game was made for the Global Game Jam Online 2021 https://globalgamejam.org/2021/games/lost-and-found-vr-5 (older version)

You're in a room filled with lost objects from all over the place and is tasked with retrieving items for clients! The faster you find items in the storage room the higher score you can get! But be aware! Everything is physics based and if you're not careful you can quickly cause a mess of your workspace. Work fast and work efficiently! Left thumbstick to walk, hold and press right thumbstick to teleport and use trigger buttons to grab items. 

There is also an experimental desktop version in the files.
